httpHeaders.User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPod; CPU iPhone OS 14_5 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) CriOS/87.0.4280.163 Mobile/15E148 Safari/604.1

动漫.requestInfo:
@js:

return {
    'url': config.host + '/vodshow/' +
        params.filters.type + '-' +
        params.filters.area + '-' +
        params.filters.sort + '-' +
        params.filters.cat + '-' +
        params.filters.lang + '-' +
        params.filters.letter + '---' + params.pageIndex + '---' +
        params.filters.year + '.html',
    'httpHeaders': config.httpHeaders,
}
